definition: to show sb how to get to the right path
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
to bewilder/crazy about/fan/enthusiast/lost/confused
saliva/sweat/a ferry crossing/a ford (river crossing)/abbr. for Tianjin 天津

sentences.english: This hand torch, Helios flew before, please him.
sentences.chinese: 这才手执火把，飞到赫利俄斯面前，请他指点迷津。

sentences.english: Get back to work. There's a team in the office in need of your guidance.
sentences.chinese: 回去工作，办公室里还有个团队等着你指点迷津呢。

sentences.english: They prayed to God for guidance.
sentences.chinese: 他们祈求上帝指点迷津。

sentences.english: Henceforth I will pray, but my cries for help will only be cries for guidance.
sentences.chinese: 从今往后，我要祈祷，但是我只求指点迷津。

sentences.english: Have you known someone who is always quick with a sharp word of condemnation?
sentences.chinese: 你是否见过一种人，他经常快言快语的爱指点迷津？

sentences.english: Failing that, let us be your guide.
sentences.chinese: 如果做不到这一点，让我们来为你指点迷津。

definition: to dispel doubts/to clear up confusion
to dispel doubts/to remove ambiguities
a maze/to lose the way/bewildering
to resolve a difficult situation and leave worries behind (idiom)
to point out/to indicate/to give directions/to show how (to do sth)/to censure/to pick at
to give directions
to give instructions/to give advice
to put forward plans and ideas (also derogatory)/to give advice (idiom)
to give advice or comments
to straighten out/to explain/to ease sb's anxiety
murky darkness suddenly opens (idiom); a sudden flash of insight and all is clear
to dispel doubts/to clear up difficulties
brocade sack of miracle plans (idiom); bag of tricks/fiendishly cunning masterplan (written out by strategic genius of fiction, and given to the local commander in a brocade bag)
very able person
to ask for advice/seeking instruction
magic transformation performed by Daoist immortal/fig. to reveal/to enlighten
